A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Movie was utter garbage and a reflection of the talentless hacks; including writers\, directors\, and actors Hollywood is producing. The vacuum of space does not exist and all 8 prior films are absolutely meaningless. This is the \"Halloween III\" of the Star Wars franchise. Jar-jar has been exonerated as the worst thing to happen to Star Wars. Utter filth and a waste of two and a half hours of this torture.
